Mount Kilimanjaro, the highest peak in Africa, is located in which country?
Which is the only continent without a desert?
Which sea is bordered by Jordan, Israel, and Palestine, and is known for being one of the saltiest bodies of water in the world?
Which of the following countries is landlocked?
Which empire was ruled by Genghis Khan and became one of the largest empires in history?
Who was the first President of the United States?
The Hundred Years' War was primarily fought between which two countries?
questions.optString: Spain and England/France and Germany/England and France/Italy and France

questions.question: What was the name of the ancient trade route that connected China with the Mediterranean, facilitating trade and cultural exchange?
questions.optString: The Tea Horse Road/The Silk Road/The Amber Road/The Spice Route

questions.question: Which ancient civilization is credited with the invention of writing, known as cuneiform?
Who was the British Prime Minister during most of World War II, known for his speeches and leadership?
The Renaissance, a period of cultural rebirth and intellectual advancement, began in which European country?
The Russian Revolution of 1917 led to the rise of which political ideology in Russia?
Which French military leader rose to prominence during the French Revolution and later became Emperor of France?
questions.optString: Maximilien Robespierre/Napoleon Bonaparte/Louis XVI/Charles de Gaulle
